entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
